snippet.title: The 9th Charnel (Official Announcement Trailer)
snippet.description:
The Official Announcement Trailer of our Upcoming game 'The 9th Charnel",
Wishlist our game today on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2005690/?utm_source=steam&utm_medium=youtube&utm_campaign=prelaunch
Synopsis: Michael and his colleagues - Sara Whitlock and Daniel J. Hart decide to conduct research at the nearest wildlife sanctuary. On their ill-fated journey, they encounter an inconceivable incident. As a result, their car rolls down the road into a deep valley. Stuck in a valley, alone, Michael must find his friends and survive multiple dangerous life-threatening incidents that lead them to believe that the valley contains extraterrestrial life. To see the fate of the three friends, play to the end.
